duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete equipment installation, repair, tower cleanings and other work as assigned.
Conduct preventative maintenance/repairs on chemical feed pumps.
Maintain inventory of spare parts, tubing, and lube oil for each pump.
Maintain a high standard of service and customer satisfaction to prevent complaints.
Maintain effective two-way communication with Sales Reps, Customers, and internal employees.
Responsible for all aspects of safety on the job, including the operation and maintenance of assigned company vehicle and compliance with safety policies.

education_certification.credential: Technical Degree or Minimum 2 Years Sales or Technical Experience
Class B license and ability to drive a company vehicle or be on the company's FAVR program
